entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
